Text: Any Stephen Coonts books in your library?  Would appreciate them if you have.  Maybe post them alone? thanks.  CP

Thanks for the good collection, BBS..... Many are new authors for me...
I made a request for James Herriot books and Oliver Strange books... Hope you will include them in one of your future upoads... Thanks in advance.

Sorry about my previous comment... I saw your Flood #11 before I saw #flood 10. Since I did not see James Herriot in Flood #11, I thought of requesting you again... I got James Herriot in #flood 10... Thanks a lot for that... Please upload Oliver Strange if you have it...
hi bb, i'm new to this, so maybe you have it in one of your other floods, but im desperately trying to get my hands on about the author by John Colapinto. hoping you can help me :)
BBS...the TPB star for Fictions ! Keep it up ..+1 !

kittu1953,
The Herriot books are in Book Flood #10. I don't know about the other author. I'm a big Herriot fan so it caught my attention.

@rfade
Thank you... I noticed Herriot in Flood #10 after I posted the comment in #Flood 11. I too am a Herriot fan and thanks to BBS for uploading it for us..

BBS thanks for all effort you put in tpb.

@bigbluesea. Thank you for this great contribution. Would you mind putting some entrepreneurial/ business books eg. You call the shots by Cameron Johnson, Nothing to lose everything to gain by Ryan Blair and A million bucks by 30 by alan corey? I couldn't afford these books. Thank you so much!
